Name: Calx's Arts
Title: Alchemical Experiment
Desc: "Not to worry. The experiment has been completed, and it is — if I may say so — a great success."

Talent.Name: Calx's Arts
Talent.Desc: Shift 1 $[K310] from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
